mapper.select: select * from board_pro where kind = #{kind} and realm = #{realm} order by notice desc, bno desc limit 20 offset #{off};
select * from board_pro where bno = #{bno} and kind = #{kind} and realm = #{realm}
mapper.update: update board_pro set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content} where bno = #{bno} and kind = #{kind} and realm = #{realm}
mapper.delete: delete from board_pro where bno = #{bno} and kind = #{kind} and realm = #{realm} and writer = #{writer}
mapper.update: update board_pro set hit = hit + 1 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(bno) from board_pro where bno >= #{target}
select count(*) from board_pro where kind = #{kind} and realm = #{realm}
